messages.subject: National Org. Name: Narrowing the Choices
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Friends, The team compiling the votes to select a name for the new national organization for homeschoolers have narrowed the selections down to the top
messages.messageBody:
Dear Friends,

The team compiling the votes to select a name for the new national
organization for homeschoolers have narrowed the selections down to the top
four choices. We would ask that you AGAIN send in your
votes, but this time for only one of the four listed below. In the event
that you list two, we will take the FIRST choice listed. Please put
National Org. Name in your subject line, to make sorting this mail more
efficient. Votes can be sent to NatOrgName@... with a cc: to
Herbladee@....

Listed in no particular order:

- National Home Educator's Alliance
- National Home Education Association
- National Home Education Network
- Homeschooling Community Network

Thank You,
The accounting team of Jeri and Mary
